caption: Very nice place.excelant food.very beautiful atmosphere.

They did a great job ruining our Valentine’s Day. We had reservations for 8 at 5:30 and ordered food at 6. They brought out all entrees closer to 10 excluding 1. When we went to ask about the entree they didn’t bring out the owner or manager Nison or Nisim or whatever that disgusting human beings name is told me it’s cooking. It’s cooking for 4.5 hours? Instead of apologizing he gave us an attitude and started cursing us out. He told us if you wanna eat, wait, if not, leave. This is how they treat customers? Did we come here to eat for free? Disgusting place, disgusting service, don’t waste your time or money here. Absolutely repulsive place and service!!
Friendly good food
Very good
Amazing experience.  The food is outstanding
Food and service was impeccable as always!!

Absolutely love this place!! I’ve been multiple times, with family and then with friends, and it’s also amazing. Food is fantastic, entertainment is definitely something you can’t get anywhere else. Staff is always polite and drinks are out of this world. Recommend this spot to everyone looking to have an event in NYC. Very accommodating and definitely worth it.

(Translated by Google) An excellent establishment for special occasions. Ballroom, live music, great staff. Recommend  (Original) Отличное заведения для торжественных мероприятий. Танцзал, живая музыка, отличный персонал. Рекомендую
The place offers a fantastic variety of delicious food. I liked dining here. The employees are always very friendly, pricing is fair and the spot is always kept clean.
You could dance and relax here, music was not bad. Food was OK, nothing special and overpriced. People smoking inside, nobody from the management care. One time to visit this place is enough....
Food is good. Entertainment is good. If you don't mind nasty attitude of the customer service representative or the owner when you call to make reservations then this place is OK.

I love this place, food is amazing, beautiful decor. I just wish singers were singing live and not playing it from the tape, I don’t understand why not to give real performance like they used to. Some singers are faking so bad it’s funny.
Good music and food. Friendly atmosphere
The food was amazing. The entertainment was awesome. I'd go back
Nice time on Friday night. Good food and music
Truly professional and high class entertainment with delicious food and fun dancing to live music and vocals.  Surprisingly fun and good vibe!
Great music, food and service.
The Best
Good place

I rarely write reviews, but I am just overwhelmed and must share my experience with Encore Restaurant. I celebrated my daughters first Birthday on Sunday and have to say that everything was way beyond my biggest expectations! The staff, food, decorations and especially the music was all top of the line! We had 100 people and all agree that the party was just awesome! Thank you again to all the people that helped make my special occasion truly magical!
(Translated by Google) Great restaurant! Music! Service!!!  (Original) Шикарный ресторан! Музыка! Сервис!!!
(Translated by Google) Happy Birthday Ilona  (Original) Happy Birthday Ilona
Kabare program  the best!!!

Pros: - excellent food - good service  Cons: - the main course was served at 12:30am when  half of the invited people have already left - the band didn't have any breaks so it was too loud to have any meaningful conversations with other guests

This review is dated November 30th 2019. What can I say we came to this place because we enjoyed it the first time but that was a function of the company i realize.  The management is rude, the waiters overwhelmed and understaffed, food not fresh ( found things in it) and in all honesty we were ripped off when the bill came because what was discussed was not provided....I only wish I rejected the charge and disputed it with my bank which I still may do. I mean the waiters couldn't even pour drinks and the carafes were always empty, people were thirsty.  From the amount of food for actual price charged this is  by far the stingiest place in Brooklyn...and I've been going to russian restaurants for over 20 years. 125 dollar banquet and there is one plate (small dinner plate) of potatoes...for 9 people....okay.  4 people from my party had dietary restrictions....not for all the food just the main course, which was discussed before. We waited several hours for the dish (branzino) and when it came it was raw and inedible...so people at my party went hungry. Let that sink for a moment in a pre-banquet restaraunt. Oh and the manager told me he was doing us a favor accommodating....again....why not just refuse my booking, make both our lives easier.  Our table was charged for people who we agreed to be alacarte, not part of the banquet....so we wound up paying 240 dollars for fish tacos. Note, for restaraunt, if you cant accommodate then dont agree...I didnt pull your tail to agree.  I wont be one of those people that say money doesnt matter as I've learned in life you need to pay for what is good...but you also have to fight for when you're getting fleeced and in this place....you will be ripped off.  So all in all 1. Rude management....check 2. Less food than promised....check 3. Lack of basic respect for the customer (management not staff) check.....great success.
Food poisoning and fraud on bill....management u willing to resolve  Book at your own peril

(Translated by Google) A restaurant or club of a purely provincial level. In general, maybe it’s not bad, of course, for a country club in the region of 100 km outside the Moscow Ring Road. The level is just that. The shaggy public — and it seems to be dressed, and with a claim — but you can take and take the girl from Cheboksary, but you will never take Cheboksary from her. The same with the male part (((((( There is no kitchen at all, and the poor format of the banquet - you can shoot a series of "Real boys")))  (Original) Ресторан или клуб чисто провинциального уровня . Вообще может оно и неплохо конечно для загородного клуба в районе 100 км за МКАД. Уровень именно такой. Лоховатая публика- и одеты вроде бы, и с претензией- но вы можете взять и увезти  девушку из Чебоксаров, но Чебоксары  из нее вы не увезете никогда. То же самое и с мужской частью (((((( Кухни как таковой вообще нет, и убогий формат банкета - можно серию ”Реальных пацанов ” снимать)))
Love it
I had an amazing party there! Music was perfect, they have their own band. Food was great and service was fast. I would definitely recommend this restaurant !
Great show mediocre food

We celebrated our son’s 1st birthday here on Saturday and it was perfect. The venue is gorgeous and decorated now in a magical fall theme. The food was top notch. And the entertainment was incredible with their modern singing and awesome shows. We added special touches like a jazz cocktail hour which was awesome too. Petya and Max were great to work with - accommodating, responsive and followed through with everything! The whole wait staff was also patient and kind. Great experience overall - thank you so much!!

(Translated by Google) A wonderful place to celebrate any holiday. The food is delicious, the show is great, the service is wonderful.  (Original) Замечательное место для празднования любого праздника. Еда вкусная,  шоу классное, обслуживание замечательное.

(Translated by Google) There is a soul in this place! This is the 50th anniversary. We will remember !!!!! The hall is all in the fall .. beautiful, cozy, tasteful! The waiters are unobtrusive but always there! Well done! Thanks to the guys separately from us !!! Food ... we were very tasty! Something new with imagination decorated dishes! I wanted to try everything! Show .. it was with the soul! Even those sitting ALWAYS danced! The artists were with us and among us! I wanted to watch and listen to them! Thank you very much ! On New Year's Eve we will be there! What are very happy!  (Original) Есть душа в этом месте! Это 50-летие Мы запомним !!!!! Зал весь в осени.. красиво , уютно со вкусом! Официанты ненавязчивы но всегда рядом! Молодцы! Спасибо ребятам отдельно от нас!!! Еда ... нам очень было вкусно! Что то новое с фантазией оформлены блюда  ! Все хотелось попробовать! Шоу.. это было с душой ! Танцевали даже те кто сидит ВСЕГДА! Артисты были с нами и среди нас! На них хотелось смотреть и слушать! Спасибо огромное ! На новогоднюю ночь мы будем там! Чему очень рады!
Real upscale 🤩

I was here on Saturday (9/28), my friend had an anniversary at this place and we had their banquet. Food was okay, service was not good, my friend basically had to pour shots for us and pass the food on the table throughout the night.  Furthermore, my other friend wore his new suit jacket, and throughout the night, the chair he was sitting on completely destroyed the back of his jacket - there was a small metal needle that kept snagging the jacket. (careful where you sit here!) Once we tried to explain to the management what happened, they practically laughed in his face and basically said he was lying and it was impossible for it to happen, and just left him standing there. You can see on other review sites confirming how unprofessional the management is.  Luckily, we had drinks (which were not part of the banquet) which made it a little bit better experience. I know I'm not coming back.

Celebrated my daughter's sweet 16 in Encore last Sunday.  I wish I could give more stars.  Food was delicious, and plentiful, and service was great.  Can't say enough good things about entertainment - their band is amazing!  Good music variety - my older relatives enjoyed classics, my younger relatives (including myself) - contemporary music, and my daughter and her friends danced the night away to dj sets (apparently, one of the singers is also a dj).  All in all, 5 out of 5.

Worst customer service. Stay away from such a unprofessional place. Right now we’re calling police in front of their building. They’re not going to return our deposit even if we’re canceling our event more than month in advance! Btw the manager was saying there will be no problem if we will change our mind. As we weren’t sure, so he pushed to pay deposit with all the good promises! And now we see. When we asked them to get deposit back they’re treating as they have “strongest lawyers”, and we can not do anything here. We will see. They really need strongest lawyer with these policies!!!! Worst place! Worst experience ever!!!!

Although this place has decent food, they ONLY cater to Russians. If you are off any other nationality, they will treat you like dirt. We went there on a Friday night. The place was empty. We were seated in the front by the bar. While we waited for the menu, the owner was walking around smoking a cigarette. He didn't care. The smell was intoxicating. They gave us a menu that was different than what they had online, which was on a piece if typing paper all crinkled. I can't help but think that they gave us the menu for NON- RUSSIANS! Don't waste your time going there if your not Russian! Needless to say, we walked out!
It’s on of the terrible restaurant in NYC They’re rude .
Good food great show
(Translated by Google) Hot, tasteless, loud without stopping ...  (Original) Жарко, невкусно, громко без остановки...

I wish I could give more stars to this place. It has nice ambiance, beautiful décor and great entertainment. However, at one point there were lots of ants on the table crawling all over next to our food. When the ladies started screaming and got up in disgust and we tried to get staff's attention, we had to wait a while, as if the staff was programmed not to pay attention. One waitress was trying to put a serving of meat on that same place, and when I told her that there are ants there, she turned around and continued carrying the order to another table as if nothing happened. Unbelievable! It took about twenty minutes for a few people to come over and clean the table. No one offered any kind of apology. Is this really not a big deal ??? The food was very different than in other places of this type, but I cannot say it was outstanding. Some dishes were great, some, so-so. Other than the situation with ants, the waiters were friendly and helpful. I believe they lack training in unusual circumstances. Management should take this into account and provide better training for their staff.

Was very happy with the food here. The pasta was excellent. The anti pasta was delicious. Had the tomahawk steak which was a little over cooked but it was still very good. The mashed potatoes were terrible but the potatoes with garlic and mushrooms were very good. Overall, I’d be happy to come back again.
Best singers
Love it
Very rude experience of employees.
Good place
Good food with live entertainment.
Best party ever. 100% good food and service. Very nice show.
Food was really good!
Very nice place. Show whole night long.
Love this place! Best dancing ever.
Great vibe Had an awesome time
Good food, excellent service. Show

We hosted my sister’s Sweet 16 at Encore Restaurant last week and it couldn’t have gone any smoother thanks to the people at Encore. They delivered everything exactly as it was promised to us. The food was absolutely delicious! The food at cocktail hour was yummy and plentiful with many different hors d’oeuveres being passed around in addition to the food standing on the bar. Max, the restaurant’s band leader, even came out during the cocktail hour and played the saxophone for the guests. It was the perfect touch to an already spectacular event. The waiters and waitresses during the reception were perfectly on point, delivering a ton of amazing food to the tables without disturbing any of the partying! Even though we hired a DJ for part of the night to entertain the teens, the restaurant’s own live band come on later in the evening and they were phenomenal!! Not only did they put on a very entertaining show, the singers were incredible and delivered all of the songs beautifully. They were fun, exciting, and really kept the partying going for adults and kids alike! Highly recommend this place!!
Was celebrating my  birthday there. Had banquet.  Amazing atmosphere.  Great service.  Good  food. Evrth was excellent.  Would really  reccomend  this spot for any  kind of party!

Recently attended a party here. it was amazing. Presentation of food was incredible. Appetizers were plenty and they're were so many options to choose from. There was always food around. They were handing out food till about 11:30pm to our tables. Was very impressed and never hungry there! They also provided their own entertainment, which was amazing. it was for all to enjoy , but very appreciated of those with eastern european descent or Russian speakers. Playing and singing music that were absolute hits and popular , with real instrument players and dancers ! this was an amazing experience.

Had my bday bash here! About 20 ppl! Everyone had a blast - Saturday night. Entertaining, food was delicious, customer service was excellent! Music range : different genres - different ages - enough for everyone to get to the dance floor!! Awesome decor! Elegant! Clean! Thank you “Encore” staff! Raluca.
Nice
Place is beautifully decorated and the entertainment was on point. Food was pretty good.
First time here was amazing!! This is a different scenery from what I'm used to and my friends and I had a really good time. The food was great and the drinks were wonderful.
(Translated by Google) Not bad  (Original) Nem rossz
I have never been to this place I don't know why it popped up?

(Translated by Google) A spoiled new year. We booked seats for 2 months, we were crammed into a corner where nothing could be seen at all. $ 275 per person, there was not anything. Divided one piece at a time (one shrimp, one fourth of a lobster's tail, one piece of meat, etc.). The show was promised a new one, but it was old and truncated. When we were in Encore a couple of months ago the show was much better than their "special". In short we are very disappointed. Guys go there.  (Original) Испорченный новый год. Мы заказали места за 2 месяца, нас запихали в угол где вообще ничего не было видно. $275 с человека , есть было не чего. Разносили по одному кусочку каждому ( одна креветочка, 1/4 хвостика лобстера, один кусочек мяса и тд). Шоу обещали новое, а было старое и урезанное. Когда мы были в Encore пару месяцев назад шоу было намного лучше чем их " специальное". Короче мы сильно разочаровались. Ребята неходите туда.
Packed and a lot of girls which is great for Bay  ridge
Nice interior. Strange choice of music, but good show. Very small food portions.

Our experience at Encore for dinner was amazing.  They accommodated our party of 7.  The food was outstanding.   The service was wonderful.  Our server, Issa, did an excellent job.  From appetizers to dessert,  everything was delicious.  We definitely will be back.
(Translated by Google) There's nothing to eat! Crushed potatoes!  (Original) Жрать нечего ! Задавили картошкой!

Very nice, contemporary, beautifully decorated restaurant. Food could be better - some us delicious and done  is blend. Service is good. Music and Saturday show- the best in town. Every song- is a independent show! Just pure joy!  Musicants doing fantastic job-  never saw anything like in this place!!!
Great music
Very nice,  music amazing , food very good
20$ entrance fee for a very small place to be in. Not very clean

Nice place, good muzic, food can be better

(Translated by Google) Great place and best restaurant in Brooklyn, celebrated birthday with husband and our friends. I liked the high level of organization, atmosphere and service very much. Restaurant manager Peter and waiters Denis and Mikhail did everything to make us spend a wonderful evening. I want to thank everyone who organized a wonderful holiday atmosphere for us. Be sure to come to Encore, it's just a super show, live music, and great food. Thanks to everyone who took care of us this evening!  (Original) Отличное место и лучший ресторан в Бруклине, отмечали день рождения с мужем и нашими друзьями. Очень понравился высокий уровень организации, атмосфера и сервис. Менеджер ресторана Петр и официанты Денис и Михаил сделали всё, чтобы мы провели замечательный вечер. Хочу поблагодарить всех, кто организовал для нас прекрасную атмосферу праздника. Обязательно приходите в Encore, это просто супер шоу, живая музыка, и отличная еда. Спасибо всем, кто заботился о нас в этот вечер!

Great restaurant. Had birthday party in January. It was unbelievably good. GREAT food and presentation. Staff professional and accommodated all our requests. Gorgeous interior. Quality Food done perfectly well.

Loved this place. Food was incredible, musicians out of this world, very decent size dance floor, which is rare in Brooklyn in any Russian restaurant, and service deserves another mention in itself. We got table right by the stage, attention paid to us by our server was absolutely non stop, from pouring vodka to replacing dishes at very proper rate, only after we were done with it, unlike in other places where you never even get to taste some of the dishes served. Very happy and will definitely go back again soon.
Great entertainment,  tasty food and friendly personal. This was my third party in Encore in this year.

(Translated by Google) A magical place to escape from the hustle and bustle of New York. Live music, unobtrusive service. There will be time - I will look again and again.  (Original) Волшебное место, чтобы отдохнуть от суеты Нью Йорка. Живая музыка, ненавязчивый сервис. Будет время - загляну еще и еще.
If I can give less stars I would. This place was the worst. The music was horrible. The food was alright. They cater to the older crowd more than the younger. I didn’t enjoy at all.

I had a private event at this restaurant. The space, food, music and service was exceptional! They went beyond my expectations and have been accessible and receptive to any wish I had. I also felt that the price for what they offered, was incredibly fair.  I did a lot of shopping around before deciding to close out this space for this event. The cocktail hour with such diverse & delicious hors d'oeuvres was fantastic! The food served during dinner was fresh and abundant. We sat down with the chef prior to this event,  and creatively came out with the menu. He's very knowledgeable and clearly loves what he does. Also, because it was a private event, I had a say of what type of music we wanted. The musicians and singers are quite talented & know how to make the party fun. In terms of service and communication, we primarily dealt with the owner and also his manager, who was very helpful and did whatever they could to make sure we were satisfied. I would definitely recommend this place for either private event or dinner celebration with family and/or close friends, or just a romantic  night out with your loved one.

WHAT A GEM!! Love this restaurant. Came here the first time for a work event with coworkers and loved it so much, decided to celebrate my son’s birthday here with the entire family. Everything was perfect. It really exceeded everyone’s expectations and standards. My whole family loved it and enjoyed their time. Very cozy.  Amazing music. Upscale food, decor, presentation, service, SHOW, everything. Truly a wonderful and memorable celebration. Good for all ages. Will be coming back again and again. Simply the best for a family celebration. Thumbs up!
I am here right now. Unforgetable music, show, food, and service. Great place in Bay Ridge. I love Bay Ridge and view of Verazzano.
Love the show. Not crazy about the food. On party table was a basicaly veriaty of tuna tartar :(

June 3, we were at a wedding in Encore. We were delighted! this is the best place for weddings, anniversaries and other holidays. service is simply amazing, the cuisine is excellent, and the show is amazing! Max is a wonderful presenter! this is not the first event that we celebrated there and definitely not the last one. Хороший сервис, вкусная еда и отличные музыканты! ШОУ ПРОСТО СУПЕР! РЕБЯТА ВЫКЛАДЫВАЮТСЯ НА 100%

Encore is my favorite restaurant!!! Our wedding was there few days ago. And it was amazing!!!! Food was delicious,  great service, best musicians!! It is s best place for wedding!!!! Everything was great!!!! Thank you, Encore!!!!! We will come back again and again for our another occasions!!!  Place is great!!!!!! Very tasteful and fresh  food! Great service!  Big dance floor. Amazing musicians!!!!  If you looking for a place to spend your birthday or any occasion this place has everything that you need to have a really good time!!! Affordable, big variety of food!!!!!
It's ok. Food is average, but entertainment value is off the charts!

I recently attended a 50th birthday event at “Encore.”  The dining and show experience was great! The restaurant is beautiful, and the venue contains everything you need for a perfect night out: The food was delicious, the live show was fantastic, the servers were friendly and attentive. The entertainers made the atmosphere fun and exciting and included everyone.  The staff were very attentive and courteous. The whole experience was great from the beginning to end.  It was Great night – I would recommend.
Delicious!
Amazing food and service
Great place for a party

Great place! From food to music, from presentation to taste -everything is just excellent. Highly recommend this restaurant for closed party. Delicious International food and variety of music create pleasant atmosphere for everybody.
Great food and great service has a excellent time!

We had a birthday celebration here and the atmosphere was good! The space was beautiful, there was amazing live music and the food was delicious. They had wonderful, quick service, all members of the staff were friendly, and helped us make the event as great as possible. I recommend!

We had an amazing party Gatsby style! Food is very good! I love this place and stuff. I love everything happens that night. I would definitely came back there and even celebrate something! Great experience
Good place for a party!

Had my wedding here and I can’t complain at all about the service and most certainly can’t complain about the food. The chef was very courteous and let us sample prior to purchasing our package. Recently Went back a while after our ceremony and it was just as delicious as i remember.
Great kitchen, service and entertaining program!
Absolutely loved this place! Food, service, music and entertainment was excellent! Will definitely come back. Keep it up! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻❤️❤️❤️

Standard-ish Russian nightclub with all the usual amenities that come along with it except Encore has a nice bar area which  you can just walk straight up to. No need for a table. The drinks were standard price and food was good. Overall atmosphere was fun and the singer's and show the night we went were fun and entertaining.

Took my american colleague to introduce her to my Russian friends and choose Encore - was very happy with my choice. We had a party of 9 people different ages. Service was amazing! We had a guy being around our table and making sure we have fresh plates and full glasses for the whole night. Management recalled me from the last time and were very hospitable and friendly. Food and music were great as well. The most we liked were short ribs and foie gras. Will definitely be back with more friends! Thanks!!
Great place. Great food. Great music.

Let me start by saying, I was previously very impressed with Encore, having had a small birthday party for myself here, then attending my friend's daughter bat-mitzvah.  Also recommended this place to many people.  So made reservations to celebrate my daughter sweet 16th birthday this past weekend.  What a disappointing experience it was.  I must say that food and music were great as on prior occasions.  However,  the service was terrible!  One waiter for 2 tables with 20 people each.  It was incredibly slow, the dirty plates never got changed, we had to constantly ask, and do it ourselves.  Had to run after the waiter to ask him to bring hot food, and there was a big delay in between appetizers and main course.  When it came time to bring the desert,  the main course and plates weren't taken away, and desert and remains of main course as well as dirty plates were there all at the same time.  There was no milk for coffee brought up,  the fruit platter was put at one end of the table , and guests on the other end of the table had to fend for themselves.  I understand it was not a waiter's fault, but management's, but they still charged me 18% tip.  There was also another big party happening at the same time, and I don't know if that was the reason for one waiter serving both of our tables or management way of saving by not bringing enough waiters.  There were minor things that were promised to us, such as closing of the bar and putting away bar chairs since our party was near the bar area ( not by our choice).  Also some quests brought flowers, we asked the waiter to take them like in any restaurant which they gladly did, however,  nobody brought them up to us when we were leaving the restaurant.  We also forgot about them and only remembered at home, since it was too late to go back we called the owner next day, he said he will get back to us.  And he did at 10:30 pm and said that the  flowers already went dead.  Just unacceptable.  But  I wouldn't complain about that  if the service was appropriate.  I won't recommend this place to my friends anymore or on social media.  But if after reading this review, you still decide to go , make sure there is no other big party going there at the same time, or you'd be screwed like me.

We had gathering there to celebrate birthday. Overall everything was great, i`ve asked few people on the event and  could only say good things about the food quality. Service was good, we were the only one group at that night and all attention was on us. As far as catering prices goes, we did visit other places all over the Brooklyn to estimate overall pricing range for our venue and Encore offered best, food/atmosphere/music band, price value.
Great food, timely and attentive service, good music. But what's most important - wonderful time spent there with family and friends. Highly recommend!
NICE PLACE
Very nice place.
Terrible noise because of this place. Can't sleep. I live right next to it.
Live music is nice, lights are well set up for there is a plenty of space around in the dining hall for food and dance.

(Translated by Google) Decided to celebrate New Year 2018 in “Encore”. It was great !!! Delicious food, great organization, live music. Thanks to all who organized this holiday! (in Russian - in Russian) We thought where to go to celebrate the New Year 2018. We stopped at the Encore restaurant. It turned out just great! Great food, everything is perfectly organized, live music. Thanks to everyone who made us this holiday!  (Original) Decided to celebrate New Year 2018 in “Encore”. It was great!!! Delicious food, great organization, live music. Thanks to all who organized this holiday! (in Russian – по-русски) Думали, куда пойти встречать Новый год 2018. Остановились на ресторане «Encore». Получилось просто великолепно! Отличная еда, всё прекрасно организовано, живая музыка. Спасибо всем, кто сделал нам этот праздник!
Good food and service
The really great place, tasty food, perfect service, wealth interiors and very interesting show. I really like this place!!! 👍😃

We are going out every Saturday for almost 25 years thus can distinguish a good place - Encore is one of those. It's not only the food that is tasty and presented in a great manner and also very reasonably priced. It's not only the service where waiters are next to you foreseeing your needs. It's not only modern and cozy atmosphere. It's also fantastic music presented by a terrific band with fabulous singers. Thumbs up, Encore!!!
Good food, good music and good Russian banquet style restaurant.

Lovely establishment. Venue is very attractive. Staff was cordial. Restrooms were clean. Great venue for an intimate evening or a large gathering. Only downfall is parking. It's is a heavily populated residential area so parking is extremely hard. Sometimes they have valet parking and it is worth every penny to toss the keys and go inside and enjoy yourself.
(Translated by Google) I really liked it. Excellent service Musicians are just a miracle)))  (Original) Очень понравилось. Обслуживание отличное Музыканты-просто чудо)))
Guy's  stay out from this restaurant in side nice but food services 0 stars
Great food presentation, bit loud, but good music. However white strobe lights is extremely, painfuly bright.

This restaurant is two for one because not only it has amazing food but entertainment is like no other. I give both a 5+. If you are looking for a place to celebrate your birthday, wedding, baby shower or any other BIG day - you will not be disappointed! Great ambience, top notch service, amazing food and exceptional entertainment!🎉🥂💃🏻
We enjoyed this restaurant very much. The foods, service and entertainment was simply outstanding. Can't wait to celebrate another event there

Food was amazing! You have to try the French toast croissant with banana ls and nuttella for brunch. The only thing missing from it was Maybe  fresh strawberries which I'll add next time. The service was great too. It was hot out so they moved our table to shade and gave us a fan.  A little pricey but you get what you pay for and in this case it was worth it.
Nice place
The great place, tasty food, wealth interiors and good show. If you like Rusdian restaurants this place is for you.

Good food. Greaf coffe too. Brunch was reasonable price and our waitress very nice not fake nice. Will return. Had the French toast and bacon. Surprising it was a croissant split in half banana and nutella inside
Spacious, good music, not bad food

We went there to give them a try. Honestly, our group is not a huge fan of Russian restaurants because of a loud music and same food. This one is a bit different. We stayed late and no one forced us out. Music was good, food was very good, service excellent. Will suggest to others.

Nice bar we just found in Bay Ridge. Just passing by we saw this place Encore on 4th ave in Bay Ridge. Excellent selection of beers and drinks. I should say the place looks upscale with live music. Very friendly and not too expensive.  We didn't eat but we definitely will try next time.

I am not sure what exactly was the problem. The event I was visiting or the general tiredness of the "Russian" style banquets but I was not impressed. I don't know if it was not the top notch presentation or not the best option available but it was unimpressive.  The food was fresh and tasty but somewhat ... uninspired and it showed. The service was great but that wasn't enough.

We had dinner at Encore in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn with a group and the food was as good as any top seafood restaurant that I have ever been to. We really had a great time. Our server Sveta was excellent too.

Excellent music, excellent food and great entertainment. Management is very professional. Music is very upbeat and entertaining. Food is delicous and great portions. Would recommend anyone to go there for a huge party or just a sit down dinner. They have free vallet parking.
We are always looking for happy hour restaurants and Encore promises to be a good one. They make excellent cocktails in a warm inviting atmosphere.

I had my birthday party there. We chose $95 banquet. There was simply not enough food. Most of the time the table was empty without the food. People were drinking and there was nothing to snack on. Worst experience ever. A coupe of hot entrees tasted horroble. Guests were complaing... The dessert that they include in $95 banquet is the worst ever. Those mini pastries tasted disgusting. This place SUCH A RIP OFF. Will never come back. Was such an embarrassment.
Great environment
Great food and live music !
great food, service and interier

Worst experience ever. We were served Chinese dumplings, one per person, small portions of everything, meat, salad, mashed potatoes, I mean very small portion, over cooked shrimp, etc. You can find much better restaurants in the area. Five stars reviews was written by family and friends. Don't waste your money. Will not recommend to anyone.

We had dinner at Encore in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn with a group and the food was as good as any top seafood restaurant that I have ever been to. We really had a great time. Our server Sveta was excellent too.
Very good place. Good food. Great music sound
great place! live jazz for 2 hours👍 liked a lot. was amazed by the amount of drinks and how soft my steak was.

Terrible food. We got a banquet menu.  Most food tasted like it was wormed up from an all-you-can-eat cheap buffet. The acoustic there is terrible; song selections (mostly music from 10-15 years ago) and performance of the artists made everyone from our large party leave well before the night was over. On top of that the owner tried to cut the costs on every dish that was served - steak salad for 12 people contained only few very tiny pieces of meat that were picked up by the first person who got salad. One somewhat tasty dish was a chicken liver patte but only few lucky ones had a chance to try it as the portion was very little.

We enjoyed the food here very much. It was much different than what you expect at a banquet restaurant. I especially liked the short rib and fois gras ravioli and my husband raved about the lamb loin on the bone. Also notable was an appetizer of porcini dusted seared scallops and prawns over corn pulp. When we need corporate party space rental for our next dinner we will definitely have it hosted by Encore Restaurant.

Brunch is our favorite meal and we have been to brunch restaurants all over the New York area. The private brunch we had at Encore Restaurant, in Bay Ridge Brooklyn last Sunday was as good as any we have had anywhere. The choices were varied and prepared well and everything was served at the right temperature. No cold eggs Benedict or warm fruit salad. We really enjoyed it and hope to be back.

We had an affair held in the corporate party venue of this place. My favorite place was the jazz music bar. It was a nice getaway. The food served at the banquet was also above the usual banquet restaurant fair. We will be back next year to Encore in Bay Ridge.

Encore in Bay Ridge is the best wedding venue restaurant I have been to in quite a while. Mush more than you typical catering restaurant. You can tell they try hard to be a cut above every other venue in the area. I would gladly have an affair held at Encore and would recommend the place.

We went to Encore Restaurant for a private party. We had a great time and the service and food was excellent. I would call it a seafood and steak restaurant with an eclectic feel about it. We will be coming back for dinner soon.
So sweet barmen's and music grate. Thanks Ilyas i Natalya fore grate evening!!!

If you are looking for a romantic restaurant for any occasion, I would recommend Encore in Bay Ridge Brooklyn. The food is contemporary and deliciously prepared and the ambiance and service are perfect for any occasion.
